title: Any chance this place won't be a cesspool like.... ever?
body:
These boards are a constant platform for rage, pointless insults, griefing each other, and downright harassment.  Unless you police it with an iron fist(as opposed to not caring in the slightest unless someone uses a racial or homophobic slur), it's _always_ going to be that way.  

In addition, forcing everyone to dump every bit of feedback here is a nice bit of misdirection to make sure you never have to listen to us.  Say anything about the gameplay to support, they'll send you here so you can get yelled at by a bunch of angry kids and ignored by Riot.  It's become increasingly apparent over time that the only opinions that mean anything to you are those of the tiniest fraction of top level players, and the rest of us don't matter at all.  One day, admittedly maybe way down the line, this game's magical popularity will wear off, and when everyone apart from that tiny fraction starts quitting, there's going to be some issues.
